text: Roche-lez-Beaupré () is a commune in the Doubs department. It is in the Bourgogne-Franche-Comté region in eastern France. ==Geography== The commune is northeast of Besançon. It is on the shore of the Doubs river. ==History== The commune was called Roche until 1934. ==Population== ==Transportation== The commune has transportation by railroad, the national highway 83, and the Doubs River. ==Related pages== * Communes of the Doubs department ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website * Roche-lez-Beaupré on the regional Web site Category:Communes in Doubs
title: Roche-lez-Beaupré
